sentences.en: A lot of people make the assumption that poverty only exists in the Third World.
sentences.cn: 许多人以为贫困仅仅存在于第三世界。

sentences.en: Dr Subroto questioned the scientific assumption on which the global warming theory is based.
sentences.cn: 苏布罗托博士质疑全球变暖理论所依据的科学假设。

sentences.en: Economists are working on the assumption of an interest rate cut.
sentences.cn: 经济学家正在研究降低利率的假设。

sentences.en: His assumption of office was welcomed by everyone.
sentences.cn: 他的到职为大家所欢迎.

sentences.en: His assumption of power was welcomed by everyone.
I would question the validity of that assumption.
sentences.cn: 我会质疑那个假设的正当性.

sentences.en: Implicit in his speech was the assumption that they were guilty.
sentences.cn: 他话语中的言外之意是设定他们有罪。

sentences.en: The Assumption of the Sand - dune.
The hostress bustled about with an assumption of authority.
sentences.cn: 女主人摆出一副权威的样子忙来忙去.

sentences.en: The new governor's assumption of office will take place next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 新州长将于下星期二到任就职.

sentences.en: The only safe assumption is that the world's financial markets will have to find solutions themselves.
sentences.cn: 唯一可以断定的是世界金融市场将不得不自己寻找出路。

sentences.en: The underlying assumption is that the amount of money available is limited.
sentences.cn: 隐含的假定是，可用的资金有限。

sentences.en: They have taken a wrong turning in their assumption that all men and women think alike.
sentences.cn: 他们错误地设想所有男女均见解一致。

sentences.en: Traditional economic analysis is premised on the assumption that more is better.
sentences.cn: 传统的经济分析是以多多益善的设想为依据的。

sentences.en: We mistook assumption that the price would fall.
sentences.cn: 我们错误地认为价格会下降.

sentences.en: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.cn: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。
